Rudy Giuliani: s omission of the September 11, 2001, terrorist attacks during his speech introducing Donald Trump.
PolitiFact: s rating of Giuliani's claim as False, citing the significant omission of the 9/11 attacks.
California Democratic Party Chairman Joh: s criticism of Giuliani's statement, highlighting the omission of the 9/11 attacks.
Media reports and public reaction: both lampooning and scrutinizing Giuliani for suggesting that terrorist attacks on U.S. soil were unique to Barack Obama's presidency, despite his earlier mention of the 9/11 attacks.
